name: Corruption Maw
content:
Corruption Maw

A gaping chasm where corruption spews forth like a wound in reality. Primary Objectives are corruption vents. Secondary markers are essence pools or corrupted monuments. The ground itself seems to be slowly being consumed.


Terrain Features:

  • Corruption vents
  • Essence pools
  • Corrupted monuments
  • Reality rifts

Atmosphere:

The air is thick with the stench of corruption and the sound of reality tearing. Strange lights flicker in the depths of the maw, and the ground trembles with each pulse of corruption.
